meanings: get divorced, [명사] divorce, [동사] divorce, get a divorce, split up

vlive.korean: 이혼을 당해? She divorced me? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 니들 나한테 용사따윈 바라지 마라![넘버식스]ep8.
[할 말 많소이다] 오늘 이혼상담소 같지 않아요? [So many things to tell] Feels like a divorce consulting firm, right? 듣기 View video JTBC PLUS : 연예계 사건사고에 관한 관계자들의 은밀한 뒷담화! 소속사도 몰랐던 열애설부터 사건사고 아티스트의 실검 등장 대처법!
vlive.english: [So many things to tell] Feels like a divorce consulting firm, right?

vlive.korean: 우리 이혼해요. Let's get a divorce. 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 먹방 보고싶은 사람~🙋🏼‍♀️
둘이 이혼하고! - 하고! They will get divorced! - Probably! 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 브이라이브
근데 혼나는 거는 은하 언니뿐인데 이 혼나는 게 저는 - 나뿐이야? Eunha gets scolded only... - Just me? 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 35회 짜냥이CAM - 데뷔 4주년 기념 리더선거 Part 1.
vlive.english: Eunha gets scolded only... - Just me?

examples.korean: The divorce left him sadder and wiser. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 이혼은 그에게 쓰라린 교훈을 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The divorce left him sadder and wiser. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His parents went through an acrimonious divorce. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 부모는 서로 악다구니를 퍼부으며 이혼했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His parents went through an acrimonious divorce. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The period between the decree nisi and the decree absolute was six weeks. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이혼 가판결과 이혼 확정 판결 사이의 기간은 6주였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The period between the decree nisi and the decree absolute was six weeks. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He repudiated his first wife and married her sister. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 첫 아내와 이혼하고 그녀의 언니[여동생]와 결혼했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He repudiated his first wife and married her sister. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There is no longer any stigma attached to being divorced. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이젠 더 이상 이혼한 것에 대해 어떤 오명이 붙지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is no longer any stigma attached to being divorced. Add to Wordbook
